data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Customer Company VH'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_CUSTOMER_COMPANY
  as select from    I_CustomerCompany     as CustomerCompany
    left outer join I_BusinessPartnerBank as BusinessPartnerBank on BusinessPartnerBank.BusinessPartner = CustomerCompany.Customer
    left outer join I_Customer            as Customer            on Customer.Customer = CustomerCompany.Customer

{

  key CustomerCompany.Customer,
  key CustomerCompany.CompanyCode,
      Customer.CustomerFullName,
      CustomerCompany.AccountingClerk,
      CustomerCompany.ReconciliationAccount,
      // AuthorizationGroup,
      CustomerCompany.CustomerHeadOffice,
      CustomerCompany.AlternativePayerAccount,
      CustomerCompany.PaymentBlockingReason,
      CustomerCompany.InterestCalculationCode,
      CustomerCompany.InterestCalculationDate,
      CustomerCompany.IntrstCalcFrequencyInMonths,
      CustomerCompany.CustomerAccountNote,
      CustomerCompany.APARToleranceGroup,
      CustomerCompany.HouseBank,
      CustomerCompany.ItemIsToBePaidSeparately,
      CustomerCompany.PaytAdviceIsSentbyEDI,
      CustomerCompany.PhysicalInventoryBlockInd,
      CustomerCompany.UserAtCustomer,
      CustomerCompany.AccountingClerkPhoneNumber,
      CustomerCompany.AccountingClerkFaxNumber,
      CustomerCompany.AccountingClerkInternetAddress,
      CustomerCompany.AccountByCustomer,
      CustomerCompany.IsToBeLocallyProcessed,
      CustomerCompany.CollectiveInvoiceVariant,
      CustomerCompany.LayoutSortingRule,
      CustomerCompany.PaymentTerms,
      CustomerCompany.CustomerSupplierClearingIsUsed,
      CustomerCompany.RecordPaymentHistoryIndicator,
      CustomerCompany.PaymentMethodsList,
      CustomerCompany.DeletionIndicator,
      CustomerCompany.CreditMemoPaymentTerms,
      CustomerCompany.DunningNoticeGroup,
      CustomerCompany.LastInterestCalcRunDate,
      CustomerCompany.CustPreviousMasterRecordNumber,
      CustomerCompany.ValueAdjustmentKey,
      CustomerCompany.CashPlanningGroup,
      CustomerCompany.SupplierReleaseGroup,
      CustomerCompany.PersonnelNumber,
      CustomerCompany.BuyingGroupAccountNumber,
      CustomerCompany.BillExchChargePaymentTerms,
      CustomerCompany.CheckPaidDurationInDays,
      CustomerCompany.CustomerPaymentBlockingReason,
      CustomerCompany.PaymentMethodSupplement,
      CustomerCompany.AcctsReceivablePledgingCode,
      BusinessPartnerBank.BankNumber as BankID,
      BusinessPartnerBank.IBAN,
      BusinessPartnerBank.BankName   as BankName

}
